title: Fort of S. Jo達o Baptista
body:
Also known as the Anchorage and Landing Place. It was built on a rocky point to the east of Machico Bay in 1708.

It fired upon the war brig of the Miguelist squadron, Infante D. Sebasti達o, on August 22, 1828, causing slight damage.

In 1910, wooden houses were built on the esplanade and adapted for a cholera hospital.
